unnormalised: Arre bhai, don't be like Raju who thought his bike insurance covered everything till 30/02/2025! Turns out, *some* policies are only valid till the end of Feb, and only if it's not a leap year! Rs. 5000 down the drain.
normalised: Arre bhai, don't be like Raju who thought his bike insurance covered everything till thirtieth february two thousand and twenty five! Turns out, some policies are only valid till the end of February, and only if it's not a leap year! Rupee five thousand down the drain.
